Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/D 'Policy Guidelines/ Internship Scheme/2018 No. 1.3.1.16, Dated the 1st February, 2018 (Decision taken by EC in the meeting dated 10.01.2018 o the Agenda no.330.08) Sub: Guidelines and procedures for Internship Scheme in NHAL FhePcompetent Authority has approved the following amendments in the existing NHAI Internship Policy No.1.3.1.13/2017 dated 14.07.2017: (i) Interns will be eligible for a stipend of Rs.5,000/- per month and the period of internship shall be for & maximum period of two months: Para 2.1 of the Policy may be treated as amended to that extant. (ii) Totalenumber of Interns may be capped as under(Para 2.3 of the Policy may be treated as amended to that extant): Two Interns (Civil Engineering) for each RO at a time (Max of 12 interns per academic year i.e July to June). One Intern (Civil Engineering) for each PIU at a time (Max. of interns per academic year i.e. July to June): Ten Interns for NHAI HQs (two each for HR/Admn , Finance, Legal, IT and LA/Environment) (V.K.
